title: Tuples operations

title: Tuples operations
text: Can we manipulate tuples?

title: Tuples operations
text: Not in a direct way.

title: Tuples operations
text: If you want to change a tuple, if you want to add a value in the tuple or if you want to remove a value,

title: Tuples operations
text: then there is no direct method to do this.

title: Tuples operations
text: You have to copy it and make a list.

title: Tuples operations
text: You will have to make changes in the list and change it again in the tuple.

title: Tuples operations
text: Because the point of tuples is that you should not be able to change it.

title: Tuples operations
text: If there are 5 items in it, then there will be only 5.

title: Tuples operations
text: The sixth item cannot be added.

title: Tuples operations
text: But now we are going to see here that what are the methods of tuples.

title: Tuples operations
text: Because they tell you how many elements are in the tuple.

title: Tuples operations
text: They give you information about it.

title: Tuples operations
text: So tuples are immutable.

title: Tuples operations
text: then first you must convert the list to a tuple.

title: Tuples operations
text: And after that, you can add, remove and change it here.

title: Tuples operations
text: And after that, you can convert that list back to a tuple.
